explanation: [0-0] A man with a beard, wearing a blue polo shirt, sits at a table with his left index finger pointing forward. On the table, there is an automatic water dispenser and a white bucket. The faucet is running, and there is a black curtain behind him. On the left side, there are subtitles that read "Voice Control Water Flow".

[0-10] The man in blue sits in front of the table, points to the black device with his thumbs and index fingers, then speaks to the black device. Next, the man in blue puts his hands on the white bucket, and the faucet flows out water. Then, the man in blue leans forward slightly and speaks to the black device; the water flow from the faucet stops.
